aboutMe.body: I have been in this business for over 10 years now. I first trained for about 5 years out of the prefecture and then worked in New York City for a few months. I try to give treatments that bring out the best of a person's charm no matter what environment they are in. I have also participated in various contests and concentrated on creative designs as well as normal hairstyles. My parents and grandparents were both hair stylists, so I grew up in a family of hair stylists. I am more than happy to help as many people as possible enjoy hairstyles.

services.firstDesc: Long lasting color that lasts weeks upon weeks and finely applied highlights.
services.secondDesc: Kimono arrangement specifically tailored to bring out the best in one's charm.
services.thirdDesc: We pride ourselves on quality hair styles and cuts that are unique to each person's style.

testimonials.firstTest: Always an amazing job by Rimi. I come back every two months to keep my hair looking amazing!
testimonials.secondTest: Rimi made me look amazing for my University graduation. Can't recommend her enough!
testimonials.thirdTest: Never thought I could look this good!
testimonials.fourthTest: I finally found a place I love going to!
testimonials.fifthTest: Rimi talks to me in a friendly manner and always makes the time fly by during my treatment!
testimonials.sixthTest: I really trust Rimi because she is very kind to me and teach me how to take care of my hair afterwards.
